mapper.select: SELECT gal.gallery_no, gal.users_no, gal.course_no, gal.gallery_introduce, gp.gallery_filePath, gp.gallery_orgName, gp.gallery_saveName, gp.gallery_fileSize, ul.users_nickname, ul.users_filePath, ul.users_orgName, ul.users_saveName, ul.users_fileSize, cl.course_name, cl.course_region, cl.course_length, cl.course_time, cl.course_difficulty, cl.course_hit, ch.challenge_name, rc.record_date FROM gallery_list gal left join users_list ul on ul.users_no = gal.users_no left join record rc on ul.users_no = rc.users_no left join gallery_photo gp on gp.gallery_no = gal.gallery_no left join course_list cl on cl.course_no = gal.course_no left join challenge_person cp on cp.users_no = gal.users_no left join challenge ch on ch.challenge_no = cp.challenge_no

SELECT course_no, users_no, course_name, course_difficulty, course_length, course_time, course_hit, course_region, course_date, course_open, course_introduce
FROM course_list WHERE users_no = #{usersNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallery_list (gallery_no, users_no, course_no, gallery_introduce) VALUES (#{gallery_no}, #{users_no}, #{course_no}, #{gallery_introduce})
